midPane.h5: OTU time series analysis by wavelet decomposition
midPane.div:
by Brian Cleary
bcleary at mit dot edu
Waveclust identifies communities of potentially interacting OTUs by analyzing correlations and anti-correlations at different temporal frequencies.
The source code can be found on the github page.
REFERENCE
Martin-Platero, A. M., Cleary, B., Kauffman, K., Preheim, S. P., McGillicuddy, D. J., Alm, E. J., and Polz, M. F. (2018). High resolution time series reveals cohesive but short-lived communities in coastal plankton. Nature communications, 9(1), 266.
